db:abstract.db:para: A custom geometry provider for rendering grids.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This helper implements grid geometry, which allows showing a grid in a scene.
For example, the following snippet would display a grid with 19 cells in both directions in a scene that has one light. Without further transformations, the grid is facing the camera by default.

db:section.db:title: horizontalLines : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies the number of horizontal lines in a grid. The default value is 1000.

db:section.db:title: horizontalStep : real
db:section.db:para: Specifies the spacing between horizontal lines. The default value is 0.1.

db:section.db:title: verticalLines : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies the number of vertical lines in a grid. The default value is 1000.

db:section.db:title: verticalStep : real
db:section.db:para: Specifies the spacing between vertical lines. The default value is 0.1.
